name: Microbiology examination (Trijam96)
description:
You will succeed this Microbiology examination

You are a student in microbiology and you really need that A. So you come to your not really handsome teacher and try to seduce him... with your intellect of course! Apparently, too much with your intellect. He reveals to be a mad scientist trying to create humans cells out of random DNA sequences. Help him and you will get  that A!

How to play :

  • Drag you high-tech DNA comb over generated DNA.
  • Match the clamp of your comb and the generated DNA
  • Click to read DNA and try a formula.
  • Find all the DNA formula to create each needed cells.
  • Each time you fail finding formula, you will get an hints to find remaining formula.

Made with Unity : https://github.com/ChristopheClaustre/Trijam96

Made for Trijam96. Theme: Microbiology.

Made in 8 hours. Exceptionally, the 3 hours version is not available for download because I didn't had something to show at this time.

Credits

  • Code and graphics by me
  • Music by Synack (part of the team but he don't have an account here)
  • SFX sounds taken from https://freesound.org/
  • By an original idea of my girlfriend.
